page.title: 08CIVIC WEEK
page.content: ON THE WEEK PRECEDING THE{GALA DAY THE{PRAM}AND{GO-CART}RACE TAKES PLACE. THE PRAM IS WHERE ONE ADULT DRESSES UP AS A BABY AND SITS IN A{DECORATED {PRAM}WHILE ANOTHER ADULT DRESSED AS HIS OR HER MOTHER PUSHES THE PRAM IN THE RACE WHICH ENDS OUTSIDE THE CORRIE PUB AS DOES THE GO-CART RACE. A SLANG NAME FOR THIS IS THE{"BOGIE" RACE.AT THE END OF EACH RACE A PRIZE IS PRESENTED. THERE IS ALSO A{TUG OF WAR}FOR ADULTS ALTHOUGH THERE HAS BEEN ONE FOR CHILDREN.THERE ARE NETBALL AND FOOTBALL COMPETITIONS WHERE TEAMS PLAY AGAINST EACH OTHER FOR PRIZES. {HOUSES} ARE ALSO DECORATED IN THIS WEEK WITH SPRUCE AND PAPER FLOWERS (THEY ARE JUDGED ON THE GALA DAY). ALSO THERE ARE{B.M.X}COMPETITIONS.
